prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness, wait 10 seconds, then turn off the Office WLED
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_wled_night_pulse'
alias: Living Room Night WLED Pulse
description: "When the Living Room light is turned on between 21:00 and 23:00, briefly turn on the Office WLED at low brightness, wait 10 seconds, then turn it off."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_pulse
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      rgb_color:
        - 51
        - 51
        - 51
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_pulse

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'light' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, office, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

prompt_results.prompt_text: Every 15 mins choose a random effect on the Office WLED device. Play the effect for 15 secs. Choose random effect, random colors and brightness to 100%. At the end of the 15 sec the WLED light needs to return to exactly what it was before it started.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: office_wled_random_burst_every_15
alias: Office WLED - random effect burst every 15 minutes
description: "Every 15 minutes, play a 15s random WLED effect on Office at 100% brightness, then restore previous state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: "/15"
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_random_burst
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - variables:
      rand_r: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      rand_g: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      rand_b: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      effect_list: "{{ state_attr('light.wled', 'effect_list') or [] }}"
      rand_effect: "{{ (effect_list | random) if (effect_list | count > 0) else none }}"
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 255
      rgb_color:
        - "{{ rand_r }}"
        - "{{ rand_g }}"
        - "{{ rand_b }}"
      effect: "{{ rand_effect if rand_effect is not none else state_attr('light.wled', 'effect') }}"
  - delay:
      seconds: 15
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_random_burst

id: 'office_wled_living_room_linked_lighting'
alias: Office WLED Linked Living Room Lights
description: "When Office WLED turns on, save its state, set Living Room to 80%, then after 10 minutes restore Office WLED and turn off Living Room"

    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'

      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:10:00'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room_80
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2

prompt_results.prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, only turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness. Wait 5 seconds after any action, then turn off all other lights that weren't part of the selected time-based action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'time_based_office_living_room_wled_routine'
alias: Time-Based Office and Living Room Lighting Routine
description: "Time-based office and living room lighting routine using Office WLED as the primary focus"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: event
    event_type: time_based_office_living_room_wled_routine_trigger
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "09:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color: [255, 180, 100]
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "17:00:00"
            before: "20:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness_pct: 80
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color: [200, 230, 255]
          - delay: "00:00:05"
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "21:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color: [255, 210, 160]
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
    default: []

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: selected time, living_room, office, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light changes state, check the time and the current brightness of the Office WLED. If it's daytime (6 AM to 6 PM) and the Office WLED is below 50%, turn it on to 70%. If it's nighttime (6 PM to 6 AM) and any living room light is above 60%, dim the Office WLED to 30%. If the Office WLED is already at the target brightness, do nothing. Wait 2 seconds between each check and action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_office_wled_brightness_sync'
alias: Living Room to Office WLED Brightness Sync
description: "Straightforward brightness-sync automation between the Living Room and the Office WLED."
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
action:
  - variables:
      lr_brightness: "{{ state_attr('light.living_room_2', 'brightness') | int(0) }}"
      office_brightness: "{{ state_attr('light.wled', 'brightness') | int(0) }}"
      lr_brightness_pct: "{{ (lr_brightness / 255 * 100) | round(0) if lr_brightness > 0 else 0 }}"
      office_brightness_pct: "{{ (office_brightness / 255 * 100) | round(0) if office_brightness > 0 else 0 }}"
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '06:00:00'
            before: '18:00:00'
        sequence:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ office_brightness_pct < 50 and office_brightness_pct != 70 }}"
          - delay: '00:00:02'
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 70
      - conditions:
          - condition: or
            conditions:
              - condition: time
                after: '18:00:00'
              - condition: time
                before: '06:00:00'
        sequence:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ lr_brightness_pct > 60 and office_brightness_pct != 30 }}"
          - delay: '00:00:02'
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 30

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'light' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living, target brightness, office wled, office, living_room
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: brighten
